id.description: Unique identifier for the bank account.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'bank_account'.

account_holder_name.description: The name of the account holder associated with the bank account.

account_holder_type.description: The type of account holder (individual or company) for the bank account.

account_type.description: The type of bank account (checking or savings).

bank_name.description: The name of the bank associated with the bank account.

country.description: The country where the bank account is located.

currency.description: The currency associated with the bank account.

customer.description: ID of the customer associated with the bank account.

fingerprint.description: A unique identifier for the bank account.

last4.description: Last 4 digits of the bank account number.

metadata.description: Additional data related to the bank account.

routing_number.description: The routing number of the bank associated with the bank account.

status.description: Status of the bank account (e.g., verified, unverified).

updated.description: Timestamp for when the bank account was last updated.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the bank account has been deleted.
